login.title: Log in

signup.title: Sign up
signup.description: Create your account and start focusing seriously
signup.choose_username_description: Choose your username to complete registration. This name will be unique to you, and you can't change it later.
signup.success: You have successfully created your account! We have sent you an email to your mailbox to confirm your email address. Also check the SPAM folder!

forgot_password.description_forgot: Renew yout access with a password reset safeguarding yout account with simplicity and peace of mind
forgot_password.description_reset: Enter one time code we just sent to yout decide to unlock the door to your digital realm. Fast easy and extra secure!
forgot_password.description_change_password: Create a robust new password to keep your digital world secure and yout information guarded. Your fortress, your rules.

success.email_sent: The email has been successfully sended, please check SPAM too!
success.success_recover: Your password has been successfully changed, please follow with the login

errors.due_date_before_today: End date cannot be in the past.
errors.available_soon: This feature will be available soon!
errors.error_processing: An error occurred while processing your request
errors.accept_terms_and_condition: To sign up you have to accept Terms and Conditions

form.valid_project_name: Please enter a valid project name

errors.operation_not_allowed: You are not allowed to perform this operation.

register.username_already_in_use: This username is already in use
register.invalid_password: The submitted password is not valid
